thread.section_title: Kiwi Sheepskins Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Sheepskins | kiwisheepskins.com
thread.title: Helen

author: Helen
title: Helen
text: I ordered a pair and then my husband (who never wears slippers) ordered a pair. And we're so glad we did. The winter has been chilly here on Orcas Island in northern Washington and the sheepskin slippers we ordered in different styles have been a dream come true. Well-made, comfortable and soft...unlike the scratchy, inferior sheepskin you can find online. The slippers are a bargain at this price and they arrived in a timely manner. Will definitely order from Kiwi Sheepskins again.
